meanings.definition: A substance that causes itching or stinging
meanings.sent1: The urticants in the plant made my skin itch uncontrollably.
meanings.sent2: Be careful of certain plants as they may contain urticants that cause itching.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally touched the urticants on the plant and now I can't stop scratching!
meanings.sent4: The urticants in the air felt like tiny needles pricking my skin.
meanings.sent5: The urticants from the insect bite left a burning sensation on my arm.

meanings.definition: Something that produces a rash or irritation on the skin
meanings.sent1: After coming in contact with the urticants, a red rash appeared on my arm.
meanings.sent2: Avoid plants with urticants to prevent skin irritation.
meanings.sent3: The urticants on the fabric caused an unexpected skin reaction.
meanings.sent4: The urticants seemed to dance on my skin, leaving a trail of irritation.
meanings.sent5: The urticants from the new lotion caused a prickly sensation on my hands.
